name: Men's 'Ascend' Boots (grey/silver)
description:
Stand firm and proud with this imposing, regal footwear. The primary layer is composed of soft, calmly grey leather that has been tanned with patented Fedo emissions to give it that supple yet tender feel. 

The outer layer, meanwhile, is a bolted shin-guard overlaid with interlacing silver-colored clips, and offers both style and substance under even the harshest conditions, giving the clear impression the wearer is someone who should not be taken lightly.
